data.text: @ShonaHay72 @balfour1234 That's all thanks tae the fat greasy rat Boris, the Russian arse kissing, barsteward, wers the revolution starting, Scotland needs out away from WM ASAP, before we aw end up in fecking, ubbers deep ditch, #LetsLeaveNowScotland
@ShonaHay72 Seriously….does anyone give a shit about this right now ?
@ShonaHay72 No room for complacency anywhere. Covid never went away. Just suited some to pretend it had.

@ShonaHay72 Interesting arc of ‘takingbackcontrol’: lorries stuck at ports with excessive, expensive paperwork as cargo rots; shortages in supermarkets, petrol stations, Labour market; partying during lockdowns; refugees can apply as fruitpickers-Tories don’t know what a political party is🙄

@RickyCa69392149 Ahhh the Sue Gray report .. now there’s a good question, buried, release date set to get 19th of Never when Boris pops his clogs after man happy years living it up in the Lords no doubt ..

@ShonaHay72 Oh! Tory policy of putting hands over eyes and telling ourselves it’s not really there not working then?
Still, there’s the rip-roaring success of Brexiteers setting up “a pop-up Visa/Refugee centre in Lille France” to look forward to…🙄
How’s the Met/SueGray Report doing?
🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇺🇦
@ShonaHay72 And that’s with virtually no testing
